title: Simple Lemon Herb Chicken
description: This lemon herb chicken is a quick and easy main dish of juicy chicken breasts flavored with lemon, oregano, and parsley—ready in just 15 minutes.

ingredients.item: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place chicken in a bowl; pour 1/2 of the lemon juice over chicken and season with salt.
Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Place chicken into hot oil. Add remaining lemon juice and oregano; season with black pepper.
Cook chicken until golden brown and juices run clear, 5 to 10 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165°F (74°C).
Garnish chicken with parsley to serve.
